meanings.definition: A visible mass of condensed water vapor floating in the atmosphere, typically high above the ground.
meanings.sent1: The fluffy clouds drifted lazily across the sky.
meanings.sent2: The storm clouds gathered ominously on the horizon.
meanings.sent3: The clouds seemed to be playing hide and seek with the sun.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like clouds, constantly changing and shifting.
meanings.sent5: The dark clouds loomed overhead, threatening rain at any moment.

meanings.definition: A large number of things occurring or moving together in the same way.
meanings.sent1: A crowd of dark clouds filled the sky before the storm.
meanings.sent2: The clouds of dust rose as the trucks passed by.
meanings.sent3: The clouds of students rushed out of the school after the bell rang.
meanings.sent4: The clouds of birds swirled in the sky, creating a mesmerizing pattern.
meanings.sent5: The clouds of thoughts in his mind made it hard to focus on one thing.
